name: Christmas Salon: XMAS Girls Games Makeover 2017
name_original: Christmas Salon: XMAS Girls Games Makeover 2017
description:
Every girl loves go to salon,
Wedding Salon is a free girls makeup and dress-up game!
Make up and dress up yourself to be a fashionable and beautiful bride in the Wedding Salon! Every girl has their own dreaming wedding!
It's a kids games for girls!
Couple wedding salon
Romantic Wedding Beauty Salon
Princess Wedding salon
Seaside Wedding Salon Girl SPA
Wedding Makeup Salon
Indian Wedding Salon
Couples Dress Up Games

Features:
- Spa Section
- Hair Section
- Makeup Section
- Dress up Section
- Many hair styles and hair colors to choose
- Select different eye colors, mascaras, lipsticks, and more
- Lot of decoration items earrings, necklaces, bracelets, and more to choose
- Romantic and beautiful scenery
- 10 unique salons throughout the USA


Wedding Spa Salon:-
Every girl loves go to spa salon,
Spa section for angel wedding beautiful and charming.

Wedding Makeup Salon:-
Make yourself up and choose the charming wedding dress for your amazing wedding. Pick up also cute hairstyle and make-up and a matching luxury accessories.You can use stylish Wedding makeup for the bride to prepare for her wedding. With thousands of smart clothes and accessories you can experiment with the popular bridal fashion trends and create new styles.

Wedding DressUp Salon :-

This dress up is 3 important periods of girl's life. First - to be in love, second - wedding preparation, third - to be recognised by society. So dress up these 3 amazing couples. 3 in 1 game here.
You can Design the Dress for best couple to look different from all in wedding ceremony.
You got a change to select wedding girls dress,neckless,shoes,purse,eye color,eye brow etc.
